external_games.name: DEADCRAFT - It Came From the Junkyard

name: Deadcraft: It Came From the Junkyard
summary:
A hulking behemoth named Revenant arrives with an undead army in tow to try and take over the Ark. It’s up to you to foil his plans and save the city!

Contains all-new missions and an original story featuring a truly fearsome foe.
